Articles.Content:
Hi chaps, good weather!

Last night I was having a mooch around with missiles, i am sure you have seen the Bristol Bloodhound I came up with the other day, and i thought what i need is a design from the "Reds." Only problem was, almost all large ground to air or ground to ground missiles were on wheeled or tracked launchers. So seeing as I cannot do tracks in this game, i chose a simple design, the SS-21. The original range of the real-life missile was around 70km for the first variant but nevertheless I think that 7km in-game for a single SRB missile is not that bad. I attempted to put internal guidance in it, i now realise that SRB's don't allow the electricity to pass through them to the canards, I also realise that i should have added more battery packs to the launcher to sustain it's range (in terms of duration.) Anyway here it is, please do enjoy it, and any feedback would be appreciated!

Cheers!

SamGaming
